channel.title: TTC Service Alerts
channel.description: Live service alerts for the Toronto Transit Commission

item.title: ðŸš‡ Line 1 Yonge-University: There will be no subway service between Finch and Eglinton stations, starting 11 p.m., nightly Monday, February 23 to Thursday, February 26, due to planned signal work. Shuttle buses will operate.
item.description: Line 1 Yonge-University: There will be no subway service between Finch and Eglinton stations, starting 11 p.m., nightly Monday, February 23 to Thursday, February 26, due to planned signal work. Shuttle buses will operate.

item.title: ðŸš‡ Line 2 Bloor-Danforth Regular service has resumed eastbound at Jane station.
item.description: Line 2 Bloor-Danforth Regular service has resumed eastbound at Jane station.

item.title: ðŸš‡ Line 2 Bloor-Danforth: There will be no subway service between Keele and St George stations, starting 11:59 p.m., nightly Monday, February 23 to Friday, February 27, due to planned track work. Shuttle buses will operate.
item.description: Line 2 Bloor-Danforth: There will be no subway service between Keele and St George stations, starting 11:59 p.m., nightly Monday, February 23 to Friday, February 27, due to planned track work. Shuttle buses will operate.

item.title: ðŸš‡ Line 6 Finch West: No service between Finch West and Tobermory stations while the maintainer fixes a signal problem. Shuttle buses are running between Finch West and Jane and Finch.
item.description: Line 6 Finch West: No service between Finch West and Tobermory stations while the maintainer fixes a signal problem. Shuttle buses are running between Finch West and Jane and Finch.

item.title: ðŸš‹ 510 Spadina: Streetcars have been replaced by buses between Spadina Station Streetcar Platform and Queens Quay West at Lower Spadina Ave East Side due to emergency overhead power repairs.
item.description: 510 Spadina: Streetcars have been replaced by buses between Spadina Station Streetcar Platform and Queens Quay West at Lower Spadina Ave East Side due to emergency overhead power repairs.

item.title: ðŸšŒ 72 Pape: Detour northbound via Dundas St E, Jones Ave and Danforth Ave due to emergency watermain repairs.

item.title: ðŸšŒ 88 South Leaside: Detour eastbound via Laird Dr and Vanderhoof Ave due to a watermain break.
